howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Translate your subtitle files in just a few simple steps
howItWorks.step1.title: Upload Your Files
howItWorks.step1.description: Drag and drop your subtitle files or browse to select them. We support .srt format.
howItWorks.step2.title: Select Languages
howItWorks.step2.description: Choose the languages you want your subtitles translated into. You can select multiple languages at once.
howItWorks.step3.title: Track Progress
howItWorks.step3.description: Monitor your translation status with a unique link. You'll see your position in the queue and when processing begins.
howItWorks.step4.title: Download Results
howItWorks.step4.description: Once processing is complete, download a zip file containing all your translated subtitle files. Files are available for 7 days.
